snippet: Marc Gold, the co-owner of the horseradish firm that carries his family's name, says that horseradish will help the Giants prevail against the Patriots on Sunday.
abstract: Marc Gold, the co-owner of the horseradish firm that carries his family's name, says that horseradish will help the Giants prevail against the Patriots on Sunday.
lead_paragraph: Sports is filled with superstitions, talismans and lucky charms including rabbit's feet, old tee-shirts and special socks. Marc Gold wants to add horseradish to the list.

headline.main: For a Horseradish Guy, It's Root Root Root for the Giants
